pages.text: An Incubator can be used to speed up the growth of bees. Simply put the BaBee in a cage, and insert it in into the Incubator together with a bunch of honey treats, and it will grow up much faster.

Another use for the Incubator is to infuse an egg with the $(l:genetics/attributes)gene$(/l) of a specific bee type to get their respective spawn egg. Please note that when combining a gene with an egg, only the bee type will be transferred and all other genes (Like productivity or endurance) will be lost.
